company.name: Montessori Way
company.description: Montessori Way has been serving the families of Almaden Valley and Blossom Valley since 2007. At Montessori Way Preschool, children are exposed to a well-prepared environment that consists of academics (mathematics, language, science), arts and music and movement. Children learn by using the many hands-on Montessori materials and by being in an environment that allows them to work at their own level in a mixed-age group without feeling peer pressure.
company.address: 4245 Meg Drive, San Jose, CA 95136 (campus of Carson Elementary)

hero.headline: Welcome to Montessori Way
hero.subheadline: The education of a small child does not aim at preparing him for school but for life. -Maria Montessori

about.headline: About Us
about.content: The mission of Montessori Way is to provide a warm environment in which children will be able to develop their intellectual, moral, physical, and social growth and at the same time, feel secure, respected, and loved. Our core concept is to stimulate the growth of the child as a whole; they will not only achieve academically but will also learn to be self-directed, independent, and discover themselves and the world around them.
